name: Too Big To Fail
description:
Description to follow soon!

Please run on a 1920x1080 or higher resolution for best clarity (it's a game mechanic!!)

Some aspects are not present and will be added after release:

-Sound effects

-Polish

We made this for 2 game jams and the game fits two themes:

AGDS Freshers Jam 2022: "It's OK to Fail"

Ludum Dare 51 (Extra): "Every 10 Seconds"
